GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Set recurring gift status to Held
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Sets the recurring gift status on a recurring gift revenue schedule record. Heifer version includes Held status to dropdown
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Set recurring gift status to Held

Exception.CustomErrorMsg: An invalid selection was specified for this global change.
You cannot set a recurring gift status to Active, Lapsed, or Held if the next transaction date has passed the end date.

You cannot set a sponsorship recurring additional gift status to Active, Lapsed, or Held if another sponsorship recurring additional exists on the same sponsorship that is already Active, Lapsed or Held.
Setting multiple gifts to Held status is not supported.
A reason code is now required for recurring gift status changes.
